mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS B WHERE U_EMAIL = TRIM(#{emailAddr})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( U_SQ, U_PW, U_NM, PHONE_NO, U_EMAIL, JOIN_DT, LOGIN_DT, U_ST ) VALUES ( #{usrId}, #{usrPw}, #{usrNm}, #{mblPno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, sysdate, #{userSt})
INSERT INTO ACCESS_LOG (ACCESS_LOG_ID, ACCESS_IP, U_SQ, ACCESS_DT) VALUES (#{accessLogId}, #{accessIp}, #{accessId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT B.U_SQ usrId, B.U_PW usrPw, B.U_NM usrNm, B.PHONE_NO mblPno, B.U_EMAIL emailAddr, B.JOIN_DT joinDt, B.LOGIN_DT loginDt, (SELECT C.MCLS_NM FROM COMMON_CD_SCLS C WHERE C.LCLS_CD = 'UST' AND C.MCLS_CD = B.U_ST) as userSt, (SELECT rl_name FROM rl_mng WHERE rl_id = ( SELECT rl_id FROM rl_user_mppg WHERE u_sq = #{usrId})) as rlName, B.U_OUT_DT userOutDt FROM USERS B WHERE B.U_SQ = #{usrId}
